name: handwritten.js
description: Convert typed text to realistic handwriting!
author: Rahil Kabani <rahil.kabani.4@gmail.com>

scripts.releasepatch: eslint . --fix && git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.releaseminor: eslint . --fix && git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.releasemajor: eslint . --fix && git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version major && git push && npm publish
